title: Ep. 81 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Brian Simpson
description:
Go see when Brian Simpson is performing comedy in your town here: https://www.briansimpsoncomedy.com/

SPONSORS: - Go to https://ShadyRays.com and use Code: BEARS for 50% off 2 or more pairs - Buy One, Get One Free. - Go to https://Feetures.com/CAVE to get $10 off your first pair! - Go to https://Whoop.com and use code "Bears” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Get an extra three months of ExpressVPN for free at https://ExpressVPN.com/CAVE - Get 10% off your first 3 months at https://Ritual.com/BEARS - Go to https://MillerLite.com/CAVE to find delivery options near you. It's Miller Time. - Head to https://Policygenius.com/2bears1cave right now to get started. When it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right.

Brian Simpson joins Tom Segura as your guest bear this week! They discuss celebrities who would cause them to flip out including Beyoncé, Chris Rock, Michelle Obama, and Mike Tyson. Tom and Brian also discuss club etiquette and who and who is not supposed to be in the green room. They discuss how much they love revenge and what the difference is between a good friend and a great friend.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
